name: Trashmass
description:
Created for the Yogscast Game Jam in 48 hours.

How to play:
Collect trash at the scrapyard (blue square)
and deliver / give ("GIVING", the jam theme) it to the target (mean child / red circle).
The longer you stay in the circle the more trash will be delivered.
Trash is both the gift and the ammunition.
Every piece of trash delivered gives 10 points, every destroyed car gives 1 point.

Controls:
-WASD    movement
-Mouse aim
-LeftMouseClick shoot
-Space shout random things
